messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
If I stare at the water’s surface
for too long, I begin to forget what I was doing in the first place.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: I don’t know how, but I lost!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Oh, right...
I was fishing, wasn’t I?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
When I looked up from staring at the
water’s surface, I saw your face.I’m not sure about what I was just
doing, but do you want to battle?
